description: This Java class 'GlobalExceptionHandler' is a centralized, global exception handler for a Spring Boot REST application. It captures specific exceptions thrown during the execution of controllers and converts them into standardized HTTP responses using the RFC 7807 Problem Details format.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring REST controller advice class that handles various exceptions globally across controllers, converting them into RFC 7807 ProblemDetail responses.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles 'NotFoundException' by returning a 404 ProblemDetail with a custom message.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles 'MethodArgumentNotValidException' by returning a 400 ProblemDetail containing validation error details.

methods.name: handleConstraintViolation
methods.description: Handles 'ConstraintViolationException' by returning a 400 ProblemDetail with the violation message.

methods.name: handleIllegalArgument
methods.description: Handles 'IllegalArgumentException' by returning a 400 ProblemDetail with the exception message.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles generic 'Exception' by returning a 500 ProblemDetail indicating an unexpected error.
